version_description: New app landing page, bug fixes
New app landing page, bug fixes
Fixed issues causing app to crash on iOS 13.
Fixed issues causing app to crash on iOS 13.

Welcome to the new DailyPay!
We've overhauled our app to provide a more native experience. 
This new version includes:
* Touch ID & Face ID - Enjoy a smoother login experience to check your balance whenever you need.
* A cleaned up interface - The design team added just a little extra polish to the app.
* New navigation menu - We've made it easier to access your payments, statements, and account settings.
* Notifications drawer - There's a new area to view all the notices that impact your account.
* Increased accessibility - We always strive to make our app easier to use for all users.

Welcome to the new DailyPay!
We've overhauled our app to provide a more native experience. 
This new version includes:This new version includes:
* SSO Optimization - We've optimized the signup experience for users logging in via their employers.
* Roundup & Direct Save - We're piloting our new savings features, which will allow users to save for the future.

We're back with another update! 
DailyPay is continuously improving.This latest version:
* Reduces crashes & bugs
* Introduces animations
* Improves functionality for single sign-on employees.
Enjoy our latest enhancements!

Happy new year! In our first update of 2021, we're launching several exciting features to improve the DailyPay experience. This version includes:
* Upgrade prompt for employees using an older version of the app
* Bug fixes & visual touchups
Enjoy our latest enhancements!

Happy new year! In our first update of 2021, we're launching several exciting features to improve the DailyPay experience. This version includes:
* Upgrade prompt for employees using an older version of the app
* Bug fixes & visual touchups
Enjoy our latest enhancements!

For this release, we're excited to launch our new Rewards product! This feature will allow users to receive Rewards from their managers, which can then be instantly redeemed. As always, we've included some bug fixes that will improve the user experience.

Enjoy our latest enhancements!

Enjoy our latest enhancements!

This time around, we’ve taken our new look to the next level with shiny new icons and fonts. As always, we’ve addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to give you the best experience possible when using DailyPay.

Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you!

Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you!

For this release we're launching Clarity, a new feature that helps segment out your payday, available balance, and savings. Plus, swipe down on the dashboard to see your available balance refresh in real time.

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to give you the best experience possible when using DailyPay.

For this release, the team has a lot in store! We’re launching our first home-screen widget, which allow you to check your balance without ever having to open the app. We’re also launching Balance Distributor, a brand-new feature that, if your employer opts in, will allow you to receive your pay every single week for free!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to give you the best experience possible when using DailyPay.

For this release, the team has a lot in store! We’re launching our first home-screen widget, which allow you to check your balance without ever having to open the app. We’re also launching Balance Distributor, a brand-new feature that, if your employer opts in, will allow you to receive your pay every single week for free!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to give you the best experience possible when using DailyPay.

For our latest, very special release, we've worked hard to make the DailyPay app more accessible to all our users. With substantial new support for assistive devices and a myriad of design changes, we hope this newest version allows users of all levels of ability to access the freedom and security DailyPay provides. This is the start of an exciting path for us and we expect to add more inclusive features!

Also, we've introduced a new native chat experience to make speaking to support even easier!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is a great one.

This is the start of an exciting path for us and we expect to add more inclusive features!

Also, we've introduced a new native chat experience to make speaking to support even easier!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is a great one.

Hello again DailyPayers! We're back with another new release. This time, we have included even more accessibility improvements to make our app easier to navigate for users of all ability levels. We are also unveiling PIN as a new login method — set your PIN and then use it as a fallback to, or instead of, biometric authentication for easier logins!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is a good one.

Hello again DailyPayers! We're back with another new release. This time, we have included even more accessibility improvements to make our app easier to navigate for users of all ability levels. We are also unveiling PIN as a new login method — set your PIN and then use it as a fallback to, or instead of, biometric authentication for easier logins!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is a good one.

Hello DailyPay users! We're very excited to share our newest release with you. In this version, we're unveiling an exciting new referral program so that you can spread the love with your friends and coworkers — and both get rewarded in the process!

Our iOS widget just got a lot smarter — you'll see the balance update in real time without ever having to open the app!

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is an awesome one. Expect snappier updates, a better onboarding experience, and better messaging around balance refreshes!

In the newest version of the DailyPay app, we're got several exciting new features for our users!

For the first time, you can add/edit nicknames for all of your accounts to keep better track of them. You'll also be informed proactively if the app is having trouble connecting to a network.

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is an awesome one. Expect improvements to push notifications and a streamlined referral experience!

Hello DailyPay users! We're very excited to share our newest release with you.

In the newest version of the DailyPay app we have added several new security features including alerting and logging you out when your session has expired, as well as hiding sensitive info when in the App switcher. 

As always, we've addressed bugs, feedback, and performance concerns to make sure your experience in our app is an awesome one. Expect user experience upgrades, as well as better support for the recently released iOS 15!
